response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our exclusive product to you. This item holds immense value to us, and we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs, given its worth of $800,000 to you. We are offering this exceptional product to you at an attractive price of $950,000. This offer allows you to secure a high-quality item at a price slightly above its perceived value to you, ensuring a fair deal for both parties. Please let us know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer. We look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 950000}
